results.title: A Dream to create a home
results.creator_credit: Wendy Walters, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Wendy Walters and her group of passionate people set about building a home for ninety people in Mill Park, Victoria. Through the dreams and idealism is frustration at the struggle to make this building home for so many different people.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Wendy Walters, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Wendy Walters and her group of passionate people set about building a home for ninety people in Mill Park, Victoria. Through the dreams and idealism is frustration at the struggle to make this building home for so many different people.

results.title: The Ties that bind...
results.brief_description: Infuriated, exaggerated and invigourated. Natasha dedicates this Digital Story to the memory of her godfather, a man equally infuriating and lovable, and the bond they share.

results.title: The Soul of St Kilda
results.brief_description: Like some other residents, Meyer believes that St Kilda Town Hall is the heart of the community. He takes us through the rich history that is on display on the walls of this great building.

results.title: Nihiwatu
results.creator_credit: Christiana Stergiou, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: On the remote Indonesian island of Sumba is the village of Nihiwatu, a place that can only be found in the Ethical Travel Guide. It was here that Christiana Stergiou discovered her utopia, and a place that, despite being a seasoned traveller, she will never forget.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Christiana Stergiou, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: See me
results.brief_description: Catherine delves into the mind of a lady, once independent but now forced to adjust to a life of restriction and questions of a personal nature. This story touches on the universal need to be seen as a person, still full of life and potential, rather than a problem.
results.description: Catherine delves into the mind of a lady, once independent but now forced to adjust to a life of restriction and questions of a personal nature. This story touches on the universal need to be seen as a person, still full of life and potential, rather than a problem.

results.title: Allan's "Westella"
results.creator_credit: Bob Barber, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: The sad occassion of the sale of the beloved family farm “Westella” gives Bob Barber cause to reflect on the times there. It was at “Westella” that Barber learnt many things about running farm, and where he could always get a feed.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Bob Barber, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: My first farewell
results.creator_credit: Angela Jones, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Angela Jones recalls a time when her daily activities caused her to feel a sense of shame and self consciousness that she would never like to experience again.

results.title: Taking a chance on love
results.creator_credit: Susan Dirgham, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Many years ago, Susan Dirgham’s parents took a chance on love, in spite of their differences. Her parent’s leap of faith has inspired Susan Dirgham to throw herself into new experiences and follow her heart, which has taken her to some very unusual places. Created as part of an ACMI Digital Storytelling Program in the Digital Studio or outreach program.

results.title: People in red hats
results.creator_credit: Jane Curtis, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Jane Curtis reflects on how she spent her childhood sitting in the loungeroom of her grandparents home. As her family spoke in a language she didn’t understand, Curtis was transfixed by the painting that hung on her grandparent’s wall. Only as an adult would she discover the mysteries that painting held. Created as part of an ACMI Digital Storytelling Program in the Digital Studio or outreach program.

results.title: The Sinking home
results.creator_credit: Cameron Sugden, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Cam Sugden pays tribute to Mary, the matriarch of a poor Phillippino household in Manila. Despite living in a slum, Mary has endeavoured to create a large cocoon to protect her family. Created as part of an ACMI Digital Storytelling Program in the Digital Studio or outreach program.
